articles.title: Chiefs QB Patrick Mahomes Has Been Dethroned as MVP Frontrunner - Heavy.com
articles.description: Kansas City Chiefs quarterback Patrick Mahomes is no longer the frontrunner for the NFL's MVP award after a three-interception effort in Week 14.
